mods.railcraft.api.carts

Interface ILinkageManager


  • public interface ILinkageManager
    The LinkageManager contains all the functions needed to link and interact with linked carts. To obtain an instance of this interface, call CartTools.getLinkageManager(). Each cart can up to two links. They are called Link A and Link B. Some carts will have only Link A, for example the Tunnel Bore.
    Author:
    CovertJaguar
    See Also:
    CartTools, ILinkableCart

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static float LINKAGE_DISTANCE
      The default max distance at which carts can be linked, divided by 2.
      static float OPTIMAL_DISTANCE
      The default distance at which linked carts are maintained, divided by 2.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean areLinked(EntityMinecart cart1, EntityMinecart cart2)
      Returns true if the two carts are linked to each other.
      void breakLink(EntityMinecart cart1, EntityMinecart cart2)
      Breaks a link between two carts, if any link exists.
      void breakLinkA(EntityMinecart cart)
      Break only link A.
      void breakLinkB(EntityMinecart cart)
      Break only link B.
      void breakLinks(EntityMinecart cart)
      Breaks all links the cart has.
      int countCartsInTrain(EntityMinecart cart)
      Counts how many carts are in the train.
      boolean createLink(EntityMinecart cart1, EntityMinecart cart2)
      Creates a link between two carts, but only if there is nothing preventing such a link.
      EntityMinecart getLinkedCartA(EntityMinecart cart)
      Returns the cart linked to Link A or null if nothing is currently occupying Link A.
      EntityMinecart getLinkedCartB(EntityMinecart cart)
      Returns the cart linked to Link B or null if nothing is currently occupying Link B.
